about_the_game:
In V-Monsters Digital Farm, the focus is all about taking care of your virtual monsters and decorating your farm your way. No complicated storylines—just a relaxed, creative experience perfect for fans of simulation games and virtual pets.

Key Features

  • Raise and Evolve V-Monsters
    Feed, play, and train your monsters so they stay healthy and reach their full potential.

  • Decorate Your Farm
    Build the ideal space for your V-Monsters. Customize every corner with items, furniture, and unique themes.

  • Stress-Free Management
    Take care of your monsters’ needs and your farm without the pressure of complex quests.

  • Fun Interactions
    Offer different types of food, play mini-games, and boost their happiness!

Join the Community!

Want to share your farm with other players or exchange tips on caring for your V-Monsters?
Come join our official Discord!
detailed_description:
In V-Monsters Digital Farm, the focus is all about taking care of your virtual monsters and decorating your farm your way. No complicated storylines—just a relaxed, creative experience perfect for fans of simulation games and virtual pets.

Key Features

  • Raise and Evolve V-Monsters
    Feed, play, and train your monsters so they stay healthy and reach their full potential.

  • Decorate Your Farm
    Build the ideal space for your V-Monsters. Customize every corner with items, furniture, and unique themes.

  • Stress-Free Management
    Take care of your monsters’ needs and your farm without the pressure of complex quests.

  • Fun Interactions
    Offer different types of food, play mini-games, and boost their happiness!

Join the Community!

Want to share your farm with other players or exchange tips on caring for your V-Monsters?
Come join our official Discord!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS X 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: V-Monsters Digital Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Raise and evolve unique V-Monsters while decorating your farm your way! Forget complex storylines—just have fun caring for virtual creatures and customizing every corner. Perfect for fans of simulation and virtual pets!
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
